column4: and to see that I can FINALLY run it on my own OS. its a dream come true! lol
ugh, sadly, that means I have to reinstall windows (what else is new)
I dont have a serial for it
I just dont like Gimp at all
I agree gimp pwnz but if you want something else then try wine to install it

follow instructions here for ubuntu: http://wiki.winehq.org/Recommended_Packages Then download this: http://ibiblio.org/pub/linux/system/emulators/wine/wine-0.9.36.tar.bz2 Then do this to install photoshop: http://appdb.winehq.org/appview.php?iAppId=17
its alright I know how right brain people can be picky about their gui layout, I had a gf same way couldn't stand certain desktop themes I don't know you guys like color sensitive or something
no you just want gimp with a photoshop gtk theme
do you know how to code? if not how do you know what engine looks like?
seriously just use wine, photoshop runs perfectly on linux
and you CAN use wine on 64 bit
